ProductInfo.Features:
2.4GHz digital frequency hopping and encryption technology,transmission distance up to 250 meters in free field ,robust anti-interference. Clear night vision can capture image in low-illumination environment.
Rain shield for the outdoor camera. 7 inch TFT color panel
Surveillance,wireless unlock,hands-free call and talk 16 chord melodies and melody volume is adjustable
Brightness andtalk volume is adjustable Tim shown on screen,adjustable Indoor monitor could take pictures automatically or by instruction,It could store up to 100 pictures with date and time.
BL-5J battery of camera and monitor is replaceable and rechargeable Wireless unlock control supports power on and power off unlock mode. One outdoor camera supports up to 3 indoor monitors.
ProductInfo.Name: 2.4GHz Digital Wireless Video Door Phone Bell IR Camera +2 x 7" TFT LCD Monitor
